name: The Ancient silver Battlesuit of Oda Nobunaga
data: It increases the users strength ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users dexterity ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (ILLEGAL in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
It affects the user's cold resistance.
It affects the user's fire resistance.
